body_html: It's always possible to manually insert individual check_numerics ops - and probably more sensible to insert them in strategic places when debugging rather than everywhere. I think it is unlikely that this behavior is going to be changed.
body_text: It's always possible to manually insert individual check_numerics ops - and probably more sensible to insert them in strategic places when debugging rather than everywhere.  I think it is unlikely that this behavior is going to be changed.
body: It's always possible to manually insert individual check_numerics ops - and probably more sensible to insert them in strategic places when debugging rather than everywhere.  I think it is unlikely that this behavior is going to be changed.
